title: Kalaupapa National Historical Park: General Management Plan
body: General Management Plan       The Kalaupapa National Historical Park Draft General Management Plan and Environmental Impact Statement (Draft GMP/EIS) was released to the public in April 2015. The GMP will provide guidance for the future preservation and management of Kalaupapa for the next 15-20 years. It will serve as Kalaupapa's "blueprint" for the future. We hope you will share your thoughts, ideas, and vision throughout the planning process so that together we can keep Kalaupapa a sacred place for the patient community along with protection, preservation, and interpretation of cultural, historical, and natural resources. We are reaching out for your kokua and mana'o as we develop the general management plan.      We welcome your thoughts and ideas about the Draft GMP/EIS. You can access the files online here: http://parkplanning.nps.gov/kalagmp. If you have comments or concerns, you may contact us via email at KALA_GMP@nps.gov or send a letter to: General Management Plan     Attn: Erika Stein Espaniola, Superintendent Kalaupapa National Historical Park P.O. Box 2222 Kalaupapa, Hawaii, 96742  If you would like to receive a summary newsletter by mail, or the complete document by mail, or to be added on the mailing list, or have other questions, please contact us at (808) 567-6802, ext: 1103 or email us at KALA_GMP@nps.gov.
